install.md.text:
## Install Datamesh

These commands will install the `dm` binary onto your system:
install.md.html:
Install Datamesh

These commands will install the dm binary onto your system:

quickstart.md.text:
## Quickstart

Get your local `dm` command connected to this datamesh cluster.

### Install Datamesh

These commands will install the `dm` binary onto your system:
quickstart.md.html:
Quickstart

Get your local dm command connected to this datamesh cluster.

Install Datamesh

These commands will install the dm binary onto your system:

quickstart.md.text:
dm remote add mycluster ${USER_NAME}@${SERVER_NAME}
# enter password
dm remote -v
dm remote switch mycluster
quickstart.md.code:
dm remote add mycluster ${USER_NAME}@${SERVER_NAME}
# enter password
dm remote -v
dm remote switch mycluster
